name: project2
description: USER STORY   1. I want to open the home page to view recipes 2. I want to be able to submit a recipe     - new Schema     - create a model to use     - return a newly created recipe 3. I want to be able view that recipe     - query for a single recipe     - return said recipe 4. I want to update my recipe      - query for a single recipe     - update that recipe     - return update recipe 5. I want to delete my recipe     - query for a single recipe     - delete or remove recipe     - return a success 6. I want to be able to search for recipes     - utilize a search bar 7. I want to be able to see recipes divided into categories
author: Ariana Briceno
